description: A doctor who is an ally of the Red Whirlwind, whom he attends and counsels after each skirmish with the city guards. Posing as the Red Whirlwind, he dies via self-immolation to avoid capture and to free wrongly accused victims. He leaves behind a wife (who knows Juliet`s secret and doesn`t blame her for Lancelot`s death) and two daughters who have yet to be told of his fate.
name: Lancelot
